attributes.action: Keep London Underground's ticket offices open
attributes.additional_details:
According to recent news, the ticket offices of London Underground are to be closed in the next months (http://m.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-london-25025888).

Removing these points of presence will affect negatively everyone: people with reduced mobility, commuters, tourists and the communities in general.

Signing this petition we ask that the ticket offices of the Tube will be maintained and that the number of staff able to assist passengers of London underground is increased.
